name: Sinewave
description:
This game was a hobby project by 2 Swedish students just messing around with Unity, don't expect something spectacular, if you want to get involved with this project or have any feedback please feel free to contact us at our Twitter; @SinewaveGame.

To keep this game relevant we will continue to release new levels regularly each month.

People involved:


Creator - Alfred Sandberg
Creator - Vige Ekelund

Graphic Designer - David Nilsson

All Music - Discokalle :)

Video Editor - Hugo Svensson

Beta Testers:
Samuel Larsson
Adam Linnerhed
Emil Enblom
Adam Berg
Kristoffer Holmberg
Fabian Lusth
